thread.title: Second stay at this hotel, good as the first time
thread.title_full: Second stay at this hotel, good as the first time - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: neenee1
title: Second stay at this hotel, good as the first time
text: We picked this hotel again for the fact that is so close to everything and they have great breakfast and evening snacks. The rooms are spacious and have small kitchens in them which is helpful. Our room was on one of the upper floors and we had wonderful views this year. The staff is very friendly and helpful. We took the train this year and the walk to and from hotel was about 5 minutes. Our place to stay when we get to the city.
